query: SELECT m.*, c.whatsappNumber FROM messages m JOIN conversations conv ON m.conversationId = conv.id JOIN contacts c ON conv.contactId = c.id ORDER BY m.createdAt DESC LIMIT 20;

logs: ERROR 1054 (42S22) at line 1: Unknown column 'm.createdAt' in 'order clause'
